original_text: Here is a lesson for you to learn about the fig tree. When the new branches on the tree start to grow, the leaves appear. Then you know that the summer will begin soon.
korean_text: 무화과나무의 비유를 배우라 그 가지가 연하여지고 잎사귀를 내면 여름이 가까운 줄 아나니

sentences.original_text: Here is a lesson for you to learn
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 배워야 할 교훈이 여기 있다

sentences.original_text: When the new branches on the tree start to grow
sentences.korean_translation: 나무에 새 가지들이 자라기 시작할 때

sentences.original_text: that the summer will begin soon
